title: 89/170/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 February 1989 amending Decision 89/3/EEC in regard to health protection measures in connection with imports of certain fresh meat from the States of Espirito Santo and Sao Paulo, Brazil
header:

main_body: The reference to the States of Espirito Santo and S達o Paulo in Article 1 of Decision 89/3/EEC is deleted.
